description: Talent acquisition, development, and workforce management

typical_processes.name: Employee Onboarding & Offboarding
typical_processes.description: Integrating new hires and managing departures

typical_processes.name: Performance Management & Feedback
typical_processes.description: Setting goals, reviewing performance, and providing feedback

typical_processes.name: HR Analytics & Workforce Planning
typical_processes.description: Analyzing workforce data and planning for future needs

common_outputs.name: Candidate Pipelines
common_outputs.description: Pool of qualified candidates for open positions
common_pain_points: Pipeline is too small (not enough candidates)
Candidate quality is low (don't meet requirements)
Time-to-fill is too long (months per role)

typical_improvement_opportunities.team_execution: Train recruiters on sourcing techniques, hire sourcing specialists
typical_improvement_opportunities.system_capabilities: AI-powered candidate matching, automated sourcing, diversity analytics
typical_improvement_opportunities.process_maturity: Standardize sourcing strategies, implement talent pools, track source ROI

common_outputs.name: Performance Reviews
common_outputs.description: Formal evaluations of employee performance against goals
common_pain_points: No clear link between reviews and compensation

typical_improvement_opportunities.team_execution: Train managers on feedback delivery, implement calibration sessions
typical_improvement_opportunities.system_capabilities: AI-powered bias detection, automated reminders, continuous feedback tools
typical_improvement_opportunities.process_maturity: Simplify review process, implement continuous performance management, standardize rating scales

common_outputs.name: Turnover Reports
common_outputs.description: Analysis of employee attrition rates, reasons, and trends
common_pain_points: Can't identify patterns or root causes
Exit interview data is incomplete or unreliable
No segmentation by department, role, or tenure
Manual data aggregation from multiple sources

typical_improvement_opportunities.team_execution: Hire people analyst, train on predictive analytics
typical_improvement_opportunities.system_capabilities: AI-powered attrition prediction, automated exit interview analysis, real-time dashboards
typical_improvement_opportunities.process_maturity: Standardize exit interview process, implement stay interviews, track retention initiatives

common_outputs.name: Training Programs
common_outputs.description: Structured learning programs for employee skill development
common_pain_points: Training is not relevant to job needs

typical_improvement_opportunities.team_execution: Hire instructional designers, train on adult learning principles
typical_improvement_opportunities.system_capabilities: AI-powered personalized learning paths, adaptive content, automated assessments
typical_improvement_opportunities.process_maturity: Implement competency framework, regular content updates, measure business impact

common_outputs.name: Employee Engagement Scores
common_outputs.description: Metrics measuring employee satisfaction, motivation, and commitment
common_pain_points: Survey fatigue from too many surveys
Long delay between survey and results

typical_improvement_opportunities.team_execution: Train managers on engagement drivers, hire engagement specialist
typical_improvement_opportunities.system_capabilities: AI-powered sentiment analysis, pulse surveys, predictive analytics, action planning tools
typical_improvement_opportunities.process_maturity: Implement regular pulse surveys, close the feedback loop, track action completion

common_outputs.name: Workforce Forecasts
common_outputs.description: Predictions of future hiring needs and workforce composition
common_pain_points: Can't forecast skills needed, only headcount

typical_improvement_opportunities.team_execution: Hire workforce planning specialist, train on forecasting methods
typical_improvement_opportunities.system_capabilities: AI-powered workforce forecasting, scenario modeling, skills forecasting
typical_improvement_opportunities.process_maturity: Integrate with business planning, implement rolling forecasts, track forecast accuracy
